item.title: Shortcode snippets for Hugo
item.description: Shortcodes help you with writing your content markdown files in Hugo. Instead of using raw HTML, they offer a more easy-to-use and easy-to-read syntax. Save the shortcode in the <root>/static/shortcodes/ directory of your website. This page will possibly be updated to add more shortcodes. Hyde-X tag Want to use tags (categories) when using the Hyde-X theme like this? Then this line is for you: <a class="label" href='{{ "/categories/" | absURL }}{{ .
